author: dennisl
msg: Add a new column for Italian.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1227385, move the checks into the commit harvester to allow
retrieving the added state just once. Make sure we handle calculating the right
parent for copies within copies by retrieving the copy-root of the parent
instead of the copy-root of the item itself.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(harvest_committables): Add danglers argument and fill it with information
for added children that are an explicit target. (If not we filled it via
the parent). Recurse properly
(svn_client__harvest_committables): Make harvest_committables find the
danglers.
(harvest_copy_committables): Update caller.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/commit_tests.py
(commit_in_dir_scheduled_for_addition): Verify the reported parent path in
the error messages. Make sure the tested item is a committable. Extend test
to include a committable deeper inside a parent.

author: ay
msg: Blocked revisions 1239373 via svnmerge
[CXF-4072] avoid NPE when a fault has no part

author: dennisl
msg: o Release Maven Archiver 2.5

author: dennisl
msg: o Release Maven JAR Plugin 2.4, Maven WAR Plugin 2.2 and Maven Assembly Plugin 2.3
